title: Industrial user as may be permitted by Maharashtra Pollution Control Board (M
clause_text: Industrial user as may be permitted by Maharashtra Pollution Control Board (M.P.C.B.) may only be allowed to be re-accommodated under the S.R.S. However, if the Industrial unit is hazardous or polluting, the concerned person may be provided a commercial unit or built-up area for conforming non-hazardous/non-polluting industrial unit in the Rehabilitation Component of the S.R.S.
